content.text:
By unanimous consent, leave of absence was granted to:
  Mr. Simpson (at the request of Mr. McCarthy) for today after 4 p.m. 
on account of personal reasons.
  Ms. Eddie Bernice Johnson of Texas (at the request of Ms. Pelosi) for 
the second vote series today, and November 3 on account of family 
illness.
content.speaker: Unknown
